sentence: I didn’t do it intentionally.” Harris also asked her about a TV interview with Dr. Mehmet Oz in which she said, “The balls on that guy,” in reaction to Peterson walking into the courtroom.
author: Marjorie Hernandez
title: Scott Peterson juror ‘Strawberry Shortcake’ breaks down over misconduct allegations

sentence: (BEGIN VIDEO CLIP) DR. MEHMET OZ (R-PA), SENATORIAL CANDIDATE: I just received the letter on your screen.
title: 'Hannity' on Biden's Ukraine war response, domestic woes

title: I Learn Something New Every Day

sentence: According to RealClearPolitics.com, McCormick has an average lead of 4.2% in polls of the race since late February, although Dr. Mehmet Oz, who received the GOP-coveted endorsement of former President Donald Trump, held a 3-percentage point lead over McCormick in a recent Trafalgar Group poll.
title: PA Senate race: Ex hedge fund CEO David McCormick tries to fend off Oz's Trump endorsement
